title: looking for body serif to complement gotham headlines
content: looking for a serif face that works with gotham. nothing too ornate or too modern.
author: bridget.e.e

comments.content: H&FJ of course recommend pairing Gotham with [Mercury Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416055641/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100017).
